file_content.text: Organa's grip on Alderaan is slipping. We owe it all to you, my lord.
Always good to see you, sir. Alderaan will bow to Imperial rule soon enough.
Your services were impeccable. House Thul owes you much.
When Thul controls Alderaan, it will all be thanks to you.
Excellent! Others scoffed at your chances, but I knew you'd find the memory cores!
These will reveal everything Organa's learned about us. I'm in your debt.
Happy to help.
I assure you, the pleasure was mine.
You can pay off that debt with credits.
Settle up.
Oh... well, of course. No one's ever been more deserving!
Yeah. I'm amazing.
For a talent such as yours, I'm not surprised.
Organa's blind to our movements now. For that, you have my thanks, and that of House Thul.
The probe droids must be stopped before they broadcast more Thul secrets.
Thank goodness you've come. I've been trying to raise an alert, but someone's jamming my signal.
Probe droids are lurking in the mountains. My thranta recon team just spotted them.
These droids are House Organa's doing. If they've spied our fortifications, Thul's war effort's in jeopardy!
Lay waste to the probes. Make a scrap heap out of them.
Destroy the droids.
Precisely my recommendation, my lord.
If I had any weaknesses, I'd never leave them exposed.
Faults must be hidden.
Exactly, my lord, but easier said than done. Now we have this threat to deal with.
Destroy the droids immediately. Organa mustn't gain more intel.
End Organa's operation.
We're of one mind on the matter, sir.
Bomb the mountains. Problem solved.
Wipe the droids out.
My plan exactly! Sadly, my request was denied. We need to think smaller.
Who's House Organa?
House Organa?
They're a pathetic family seeking to bring Alderaan back into the Republic fold. Spying on us is just their style.
How is this my problem?
Surely you don't want to see Organa in power. If we give up here, we cede more power to the Republic.
Unfortunately, Organa's probes are well armed, even traveling in heavily fortified groups.
It's time House Thul shows Organa our might. We must destroy these droids and retrieve their memory cores.
What purpose will their memory cores serve?
How will that help?
They'll reveal the intel Organa's collected, so we may preempt their attacks.
These cores are crucial to Thul's success.
Isn't that your job?
It would take a small army of our troops, and raising a full alert will only show Organa how we respond to a crisis.
We need those droids' memory cores taken fast and quietly.
I'll get them, right after I tear those droids apart.
Of course.
Brilliant! Wish I could witness every moment of your battle!
Fine. Seems simple.
Fantastic! You're too gracious!
I'm busy. [Refuse quest]
I understand. I won't keep you any longer.
I'll find the cores. Anything to get out of here.
Enough of this. I'll get them.
I understand--eager to see action.
Again, they travel in fortified groups so be on your guard.
The border's clear. Nothing to report.
